title: Ready, Set, and BEGIN
description: How did we become BTS Army? What happened to Rocky as Emily went down the BTS rabbit hole? Why a podcast about BTS? Thanks for listening!

title: Let’s get personal with MOTS Persona
description: In our first official episode, we reminisce about our first BTS album, MOTS: Persona! Join as we explore each song and get into everything from psychoanalysis to video games. Persona-lly, Persona is one of our favorites!

title: Just a spoonful of Suga helps the Shadow go down
description: Suga, spice, and everything nice, that’s what this week’s episode is made of! Join us as we talk about Interlude: Shadow, the dark side of fame and the bright side of how art can be used to process and heal.

title: Gracefully exploring the depths of the Black Swan Art Film
description: This week, we do a deep (swan) dive into Black Swan and discuss the power of art and performance in a global context through BTS’ lyrics and the Black Swan art film. Let’s do our thang and really dig into it!

title: This way to Ego, igeo, Ego
description: (Yoongi voice) J-HOPEEEEE! Join us in breaking down Outro: Ego as we try to scratch the surface of what makes J-Hope such an inspiration and a beacon of sunshine in the dark. Without any further ado, let’s (E)go!

title: Flying high with Wings solo songs
description: We BEGIN this week, taking flight with Wings! We’ll be taking you under our wing and giving you a breakdown of the solo songs in the album. We explore the stories of each member through their songs, with both the lyrics and RM’s live show about the album. It’ll be an emotional journey, but you can trust us; we can’t Lie about how much we love our boys!

title: I’m your Hope. You’re my Hope. Hope World!
description: We are J-Hopelessly in Love, and this week, it’s all about J-Hope! In this episode, we celebrate Jung Ho-seok’s birthday by breaking down (and gushing about) his mixtape, Hope World.

title: UGH! MOTS7 is so good!
description: Hey, Friends! At long last, the countdown to MOTS:7 is now 00:00! Join us as we connect with our Inner Child and celebrate the MOTS:7 release. Our excitement has been Louder Than Bombs, but we know your ears aren’t Bulletproof so we’ve managed to keep it down so you can listen to this episode at any time, even under the pale Moon-light! We only had time for 7 songs this week (Ugh!, right?), but don’t worry! We’ll be back next week to conclude our exploration into this fantastic new album!

title: ON Top of the World: MOTS:7 pt. 2
description: Let’s have some un-Filter-ed discussion on the rest of MOTS:7! This week, we will show some Respect to the other 4 songs in this wonderful album. My Time is limited, so let’s bring it ON!
